bug.author: aschernov
bug.summary: CVAT new UI: a bug with hidden objects mapping
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>My actions before raising this issue</denchmark-h>
Read/searched the docs Searched past issues
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behaviour</denchmark-h>
Hidden objects should have a correct mapping. After pressing T+H all the objects must become invisible on a frame and have a corresponding icon with the current condition on the right objects panel. The second pressing T+H must return visibility for all objects and change the current condition on the right panel. <denchmark-h:h3>Current Behaviour</denchmark-h>
It's enough to repeat the hide/unhide action (T+H) several times to get the following result: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45849884/86449704-380a7000-bd21-11ea-8d38-a045ed125eea.JPG></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Possible Solution</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)</denchmark-h>
Draw several objects Try to use T+H hotkey to visibility settings. Noticed that this problem mostly happens after moving between frames
<denchmark-h:h3>Context</denchmark-h>
